[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=””]Apply to join our expert network of fractional CFOs. Please complete the form below with accurate information  [/vc_column_text]

Your Email Address(Required)

SECTION 2: PROFESSIONAL BACKGROUND

Your Previous Employers
Please list your previous employers, the dates you worked and the position you held
Employer
Dates
Position
Phone
 
What is your total years of experience:(Required)
How many Years of CFO experience do you have?(Required)
What industries do you have experience in? (Select up to 2)(Required)

SECTION 3: FUNCTIONAL EXPERTISE

Which of the following areas are you most experienced in?(Required)
What tools & platforms are you proficient with? (Check all that apply)(Required)

SECTION 4: DEMONSTRATED IMPACT

SECTION 5: UPLOADS AND REFERENCES

Upload your resume in .pdf, .doc or .docx format
Accepted file types: pdf, doc, docx, Max. file size: 25 MB.

SECTION 6: PREFERENCES & AVAILABILITY

How many days are you available for in a week?(Required)

SECTION 7: LEGAL & CONSENT
